file.name: LocationSearchRequest.yaml
file.content:
info: title: BrAPI version: '' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: {} components: schemas: LocationSearchRequest: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersPaging' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersExternalReferences' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersLocations' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersCommonCropNames' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersPrograms' - type: object properties: abbreviations: description: A list of shortened human readable names for a set of Locations type: array items: type: string example: ['L1', 'LHC'] altitudeMin: description: The minimum altitude to search for type: number example: 20 altitudeMax: description: The maximum altitude to search for type: number example: 200 countryCodes: description: '[ISO_3166-1_alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3) spec' type: array items: type: string example: ['USA', 'PER'] countryNames: description: The full name of the country to search for type: array items: type: string example: ['United States of America', 'Peru'] coordinates: $ref: '#/components/schemas/geoJSONSearchArea' instituteAddresses: description: The street address of the institute to search for type: array items: type: string example: ['123 Main Street', '456 Side Street'] instituteNames: description: The name of the institute to search for type: array items: type: string example: ['The Institute', 'The Other Institute'] locationTypes: description: The type of location this represents (ex. Breeding Location, Storage Location, etc) type: array items: type: string example: ['Nursery', 'Storage Location'] parentLocationDbIds: description: |- The unique identifier for a Location
The Parent Location defines the encompassing location that this location belongs to. For example, an Institution might have multiple Field Stations inside it and each Field Station might have multiple Fields. type: array items: type: string example: ['b28911cf', '5071d1e4'] parentLocationNames: description: |- A human readable name for a location
The Parent Location defines the encompassing location that this location belongs to. For example, an Institution might have multiple Field Stations inside it and each Field Station might have multiple Fields. type: array items: type: string example: ['Location Alpha', 'The Large Hadron Collider']

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "LocationSearchRequest": resolve "#/components/schemas/LocationSearchRequest": allOf: at Specification/BrAPI-Core/Locations/Schemas/LocationSearchRequest.yaml:10:15: $ref: resolve "#/components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersPaging": resolve: can't find value for "components/schemas/SearchRequestParametersPaging"
